rows.label: tev011601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Justin about BLADE's mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Justin about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Justin for his thoughts on
friendship treaties with xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Justin about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Justin about the battle for the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0001
rows.name:
We were chosen from among tens of billions of humans
to board the White Whale and leave our home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0003
rows.name:
We owe it to the countless lives that perished on
Earth to carry on their legacy, no matter what comes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0004
rows.name:
This is our destiny! We have to safeguard the genes
we've carried since the birth of humanity and pass
them on to the next generation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0005
rows.name:
That's why we came here to Mira, and why we're
searching so doggedly for the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0006
rows.name:
It will not be easy, but with your help, we will succeed.
One day you'll use your power to destroy a great evil
and lead humanity to a bright future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0009
rows.name:
I've been searching for a great [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] since I was a
child, but never expected that one would appear just
in the nick of time to save me as you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0010
rows.name: I was so happy, I almost burst into tears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ever since that day, I've felt that your destiny is
inexorably linked to my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0012
rows.name:
I believe that if we both pursue a righteous path,
our destinies will one day merge in a significant way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0013
rows.name:
So continue pursuing your BLADE duties to kindle the
fires of justice that burn so brightly within you, and I'll
continue staking my life on my own fight for justice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0021
rows.name:
I heard from a Ma-non that it was your team who
rescued them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0022
rows.name:
Your deed has blazed a new trail for humans and
xenoforms to join hands in peace and cooperation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0023
rows.name:
You are every bit the hero I hoped you were!
I can't wait to see what great feat you accomplish next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Ah, but it is not enough for me to root you on.
I must work harder and become a man worthy to
stand at your side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0040
rows.name:
That enemy who led the attack...? Her name was Ryyz,
I believe. Anyway, I heard that you were the ones who
chased her off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0041
rows.name:
It filled me with pride to hear that, but also a strange
sense of loneliness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0042
rows.name:
Why, you ask? Because it meant my own personal
[ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] would now be the savior of all of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0043
rows.name:
Your deed has elevated you far beyond the likes of me.
But that doesn't mean I've strayed from my own path
of righteousness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0044
rows.name:
One day I will perform a great deed that will land
me a spot by your side. This I swear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0059
rows.name:
Luxaar has fallen. It seems like a happy ending,
and yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0060
rows.name:
Well, this was supposed to be a story of your absolute
righteousness triumphing over the Ganglion's absolute
evil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0061
rows.name:
But your triumph was tarnished by that BLADE's
betrayal. Such insult cannot be allowed to stand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0062
rows.name: And is it true that traitor still lives?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0063
rows.name:
He should have been put to death immediately.
I can't imagine what BLADE HQ is thinking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Justin about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0064
rows.name:
Luxaar has fallen. It seems like a happy ending,
and yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0065
rows.name:
This was supposed to be a story of your absolute
righteousness triumphing over the Ganglion's absolute
evil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0066
rows.name:
But your triumph was tarnished by that BLADE's
betrayal. Such insult cannot be allowed to stand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0067
rows.name: And is it true that traitor still lives?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0068
rows.name:
He should have been put to death immediately.
I can't imagine what BLADE HQ is thinking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0071
rows.name:
When we crash-landed on Mira, it was a life-or-death
battle just to survive at first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0072
rows.name:
Everyone worked together to bring New LA to life,
and there wasn't anyone committing weird crimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0073
rows.name:
But now that we're at peace and no longer have to
fight for our lives, more and more people are losing
their ethical compass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0074
rows.name:
I will not allow these spoiled wretches to ruin the
sanctity of New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0075
rows.name:
That's why I've joined the Mediators, the division that
maintains order within the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011601_MSG0076
rows.name:
It may not provide the opportunity to become a great
hero like yourself, but I've devoted my life to the fight
for justice, and will do so for as long as I am able.[ST:wait ]
